benchmark_details.name: POS-Tagged Lexicon for Kurdish (Sorani)
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents the approach of leveraging the resource of a close language to Kurdish to enrich its resources, leading to the development of a Kurdish (Sorani) POS-tagged lexicon from a Persian (Farsi) tagged corpus.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop a POS-tagged lexicon for Kurdish (Sorani) to assist in automating the tagging process and enabling further linguistic resource availability.

data.source: Bijankhan corpus in Persian used for translation and tagging into Kurdish.
data.annotation: Combination of manual evaluation, machine translation, and automated duplication removal.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy was checked by manually reviewing the translated entries.
methodology.interpretation: Entries labeled as 'correct' were further verified for their accuracy and relevance.
methodology.validation: Manual processes were applied to ensure accuracy and relevance of tagging.
